english.segment1: Well I burned my past. I sent it up in flames. I threw away my keys. I got my name changed
english.segment2: Don't you remember me: always on the run?. I got the sunshine on. And I'm growing fast. You will never see me crawl again
english.segment3: Chorus: All hands up: who has had enough?. Come on make your mind up. All hands all hands up
english.segment4: All hands up: anyone strong enough?. The world needs someone tough. All hands all hands up
english.segment5: Where's the Truth?. Something Absolute?. I'd give everything I have. For something I don't have to prove
english.segment6: Who's going to stand with me?. Who's it going to be?. This is just to die for. It takes a fool to see. You will never ever crawl again
